languages.text: "Хорошо, если бы Теодора приказала назвать свое имя — что бы ты ответил?"
"Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"
languages.original_text: "Хорошо, если бы Теодора приказала назвать свое имя — что бы ты ответил?"

traits.locale_text: "Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"
"Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"
"Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"
"Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"
"Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"
"Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"

languages.text: «Muy bien, pero, si Theodora te ordenara decirle tu nombre, ¿qué responderías?».
languages.original_text: "Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien, pero, si Theodora te ordenara decirle tu nombre, ¿qué responderías?».

languages.text: “很好，但如果西奥多拉命令你告诉她你的真名，你会如何回答？”
languages.original_text: "Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"

traits.locale_text: “很好，但如果西奥多拉命令你告诉她你的真名，你会如何回答？”

languages.text: 「わかった。しかし、もしシオドーラが君に名前を言うように命令したとしたら、どう答える？」
languages.original_text: "Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"

traits.locale_text: 「わかった。しかし、もしシオドーラが君に名前を言うように命令したとしたら、どう答える？」

languages.text: "Also schön. Aber wenn Theodora Euch befehlen würde, ihr Euren Namen zu nennen, was würdet Ihr sagen?"
languages.original_text: "Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"

traits.locale_text: "Also schön. Aber wenn Theodora Euch befehlen würde, ihr Euren Namen zu nennen, was würdet Ihr sagen?"

languages.text: « Je vois. Mais imaginons un instant que Théodora en personne vous ordonne de vous présenter, que lui répondriez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vois. Mais imaginons un instant que Théodora en personne vous ordonne de vous présenter, que lui répondriez-vous ? »

languages.text: "Pekâlâ. Theodora sana adını söylemeni emretse ne cevap verirdin?"
languages.original_text: "Very well. But if Theodora were to order you to tell her your name, how would you respond?"

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ. Theodora sana adını söylemeni emretse ne cevap verirdin?"
